We were not given the details from the police of what was going on outside of the school, but we made sure our scholars and teachers stayed safe. That is our main priority. We want to reassure our parents that our ultimate priority is the safety and welfare of our scholars, teachers and staff.

Immediate notification was not given because our priority was the security of the children and making sure their safety was secured. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
